posts.post_content:
Hello all. The Monster has me in it's clutches! The following represents all the cards I have that are not SGC T206's. I would like to trade for your SGC only (40-60) T206's. Rather than list 100 cards I want, just tell me what you have available. I am interested especially in any HOF'ers 40 or better (no creases) or commons (50 or better). The 2 commons on top of my list are Mike Powers and Fred Merkle (fielding) followed by around 80 other cards. No list is too big or too small, let's make a deal! See attached scans and send yours to: [url]quinnsryche@comcast.net[/url] with your offers.
Thanks!
Cards now for sale, see info below.

It's going to be really, really tough for you to get a Fred Merkle (Batting)......

Since he only comes in 2 poses: Portrait or Throwing ;)

Well, due to lack of interest in trading, the cards are now for stright sale and I'll search out my own card deals. Prices are as follows:
T212 Manush - $65
T210 Ison - $70
M116 Sullivan - $70
M116 Zwilling - $80
T207 Lapp - $50
T205 White - SOLD
Discounts for multiple purchases, all s & h on me. Paypal, money order or check all ok. Feel free to make an offer and I'm still interested in trading for the T206's as listed in the original post. C'mon guys, I got the itch to do some dealin'.
Here's the T205 scans as promised + the back of the T207.

White - Traded (Thanks Bill!), Quinn - No longer available.
Last price drops before heading to ebay.
